description: Defines the Note entity class for the notes application, representing individual notes with fields such as id, user association, title, content, timestamps, and archive status.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Entity class for user notes, mapped to the 'notes' table with a soft delete (archive) flag and relations to the User entity.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier (UUID) of the note.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier (UUID) of the note.

methods.name: getUser
methods.description: Returns the User object associated with the note.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Associates a User object with the note.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note, trims null to empty string.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note, nulls converted to empty string.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the note.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp of the note.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the last updated timestamp of the note.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the last updated timestamp of the note.

methods.name: isArchived
methods.description: Checks if the note is archived (soft-deleted).

methods.name: setArchived
methods.description: Sets the archive status of the note.
